description.zh-CN: 1980-90年代录像带美学，融合扫描线、色彩失真、信号干扰和像素颗粒。营造怀旧、模糊、故障美学的视觉体验。完美适用于复古媒体、音乐视频、创意艺术等主题。
description.en-US: 1980s-90s VHS tape aesthetics combining scanlines, color distortion, signal interference, and pixelated grain. Creates nostalgic, blurred, glitch art visual experiences. Perfect for retro media, music videos, creative art themes.
